attributes.action: View with favour reparations for Black people and Mixed-Black people.
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government or Parliament to view with favour the establishment of an umbrella organisation to seek reparations for Black people and Mixed-Black people because we believe the Government or Parliament would support orderly behaviour in the seeking of reparatory justice for Black people and Mixed-Black people. An umbrella organisation for reparatory justice would allow organisations to work together formally to coordinate activities and/or pool resources with more clarity and precision.
attributes.background: We want the UK Government to view with favour the establishment of an umbrella organisation to seek reparations for Black people and Mixed-Black people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean when you say that you want the Government to "view with favour the establishment of an umbrella organisation to seek reparations for Black people and Mixed-Black people".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Provide reparations for the African and Caribbean slave trade: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631296
